Description.Text: Tsaghkadzor Marriott Hotel is a modern 4-star superior property offering contemporary accommodation in west Tsaghkadzor. Highlights include a wellness centre, five restaurants and bars and an excellent location next to the ski lifts. Tsaghkadzor is a spa town and a popular health resort located to the north of Yerevan. Surrounded by beautiful mountains, Tsaghkadzor is also an excellent ski destination. Nearby places of interest include Kecharis Monastery, Meghradzor Church and Bjni Fortress. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise building surrounded by seven villas. Facilities include a gym, an indoor swimming pool, a whirlpool, a sauna, a steam room, a sports court, billiards tables and a shooting range. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 21sqm and decorated in a bright, contemporary style with dark wood furniture. They feature a small seating area. Amenities include air-conditioning, a 32-inch flat-screen TV, a safe, a work desk, tea and coffee equipment and a mini-fridge. The en-suite bathrooms feature a shower. The Brasserie Tsaghkadzor restaurant offers traditional Armenian specials with buffet and a-la-carte service. The Atrium Lounge Bar serves quick snacks and sandwiches. The hotel also has a Tea House, a sports bar and a cafe. The hotel offers 24-hour room service.
